name: student-welfare-platform
description: 学生开发者福利展示平台 - Cloudflare 部署配置

scripts.deploy:pages: npm run build && wrangler pages publish ./dist
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html styles.css script.js test.html PROJECT_README.md dist/

scripts.predeploy: npm run check && npm run build
